name: Lamp Fuel Warning Messages
description: Testing lamp dimming warning messages as fuel runs low

entries.expectedOutput:
You are carrying:
  A brass lantern (providing light)
entries.notes: Checking lamp status - should be on and providing light

entries.expectedOutput:
Time passes...
The brass lantern is getting dim.
entries.notes: First warning - lamp is getting dim

entries.expectedOutput:
Time passes...
The brass lantern has gone out.
The lamp has run out of power.
entries.notes: Cannot turn on lamp with no fuel

entries.expectedOutput: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a grue.
entries.notes: Dark room description with dead lamp
